description: This simple restaurant right on the seafront facing the island of Tavolara is run by a highly experienced couple working alongside an excellent chef who creates modern cuisine from the best fish in the region, as well as offering a few local meat dishes. Reservations are highly recommended in summer when the large outdoor panoramic terrace is always teeming with customers.
